description:
This app is a launcher for Echo Memo Pad.  It allows you to open Echo Memo Pad from outside of Echo.  This app works in conjunction with Echo and requires Echo to be installed.
The screen shots are of Echo Memo Pad.
Echo Memo Pad is included with Echo. Echo Memo Pad features include:
- Enhanced webOS memo application.
- View memos by categories.
- Most recent list.
- Full-text search
- E-mail memos.
- And much, much more.  Install Echo and try it today for free.

Palm Desktop 6.2.2 and Wi-Fi or Bluetooth PAN are required to use Echo. USB is not supported.  Echo is $39.95 to purchase and is a free upgrade to current customers.
